title: United States : retail e-commerce sales 2017 to 2024
summary: In general Revenue in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2022 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2022 and 2023.
Maximum Revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 599186.0 was reported at Year 2024
The lowest Revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 524091.0 was reported at Year 2022
